summary: I am a digital marketing strategist specializing in lead generation through content strategy, digital campaign optimization, and marketing on digital and social media platforms.
skills: Video editing software including AVID, Final Cut Pro and Apple iMovie
Content management systems including Blogger, Sitecore and Wordpress
Radian 6 and other social media listening tools
Social media platforms and engagement consoles
Video content development including scriptwriting and storyboarding
